snippet: The trainer Todd Pletcher has lost a top Kentucky Derby contender to injury or illness for three straight years but remains optimistic about other horses he has.
abstract: Trainer Todd Pletcher's horse Algorithms is scratched from Gulfstream Park's Fountain Youth Stakes with right front leg injury, keeping him out of the Triple Crown races.
lead_paragraph: The trainer Todd Pletcher has lost a top Kentucky Derby contender to injury or illness for three straight years but remains optimistic about other horses he has.

headline.seo: Algorithms Is Out, but Todd Pletcher’s Other Horses Have Promise
headline.main: Pletcher Loses a Derby Favorite but Retains Hope
headline.print_headline: Pletcher Loses a Derby Favorite but Retains Hope
